comment: It was her first time teaching the class, but in the beginning, she made it seem like she knew what she was talking about. The activities and syllabus were not hers. It was wayyyy too much work for a 6-week course. I would not take her again.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy--Tough grader

comment: Dr. Brennan was a bright light during a stressful semester! I looked forward to going to her class each week. She is a veteran teacher with much wisdom to share! When it comes to grading assignments, she's consistent with the rubrics and provides constructive feedback for future assignments!

Dr. Brennan is the most incredible professor I have ever taken. She is so helpful and understanding and genuinely cares about her students. Attendance is not mandatory, but it definitely helps if you go to class. She is awesome, you should definitely take her.

Dr. Brennan is AMAZING! I have learned so much in her class! Every assignment has a purpose, and she is very flexible when it comes to turning in assignments. She communicates well and grades assignments quickly. Her class was awesome. I wish I could take her for every course.

Dr. Brennan was an AWESOME professor.  This course gave me more information on teaching than any class so far.  The assignments were fun and no two were the same.  She keeps things interesting and real.  VERY refreshing !!
